Package org.smtlib.solvers

This package implements various instances of org.smtlib.ISolver, which are specific solvers that wrap and interact with various off-the-shelf SMT solvers currently available.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Solver_cvc
    This class implements the adapter of SMTv2 to old CVC commands.
    Solver_simplify
    The adapter that drives the Simplify solver.
    Solver_simplify.Translator  
    Solver_smt
    This class is an adapter that takes the SMT-LIB ASTs and translates them into SMT commands
    Solver_test
    This class is a Solver implementation that simply type-checks formulae and checks that commands are used correctly; it does not do any proving.
    Solver_yices
    This class is the adapter for the Yices SMT solver
    Solver_z3_2_11  
    Solver_z3_4_3
    This class is an adapter that takes the SMT-LIB ASTs and translates them into Z3 commands

Package org.smtlib.solvers Description

This package implements various instances of org.smtlib.ISolver, which are specific solvers that wrap and interact with various off-the-shelf SMT solvers currently available. The available solvers are not necessarily SMT-LIB compliant; the wrappers implemented in this package translate to and from the given SMT solvers, so as to present an SMT-LIB-compliant interface to the user, while using the solving capability of the solver itself.
